Docs.summary: Various extension methods to convert between SkiaSharp types and UIKit types.

MemberSignature.Value: public static SkiaSharp.SKBitmap ToSKBitmap (this UIKit.UIImage uiImage);
.method public static hidebysig class SkiaSharp.SKBitmap ToSKBitmap(class UIKit.UIImage uiImage) cil managed

Docs.summary: Converts a UIKit image into a SkiaSharp bitmap.
Docs.returns: Returns a copy of the image data as a SkiaSharp bitmap.

MemberSignature.Value: public static SkiaSharp.SKColor ToSKColor (this UIKit.UIColor color);
.method public static hidebysig valuetype SkiaSharp.SKColor ToSKColor(class UIKit.UIColor color) cil managed

Docs.summary: Converts a UIKit color into a SkiaSharp color.

MemberSignature.Value: public static SkiaSharp.SKImage ToSKImage (this UIKit.UIImage uiImage);
.method public static hidebysig class SkiaSharp.SKImage ToSKImage(class UIKit.UIImage uiImage) cil managed

Docs.summary: Converts a UIKit image into a SkiaSharp image.
Docs.returns: Returns a copy of the image data as a SkiaSharp image.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool ToSKPixmap (this UIKit.UIImage uiImage, SkiaSharp.SKPixmap pixmap);
.method public static hidebysig bool ToSKPixmap(class UIKit.UIImage uiImage, class SkiaSharp.SKPixmap pixmap) cil managed

Docs.param: The SkiaSharp pixmap to hold the copy of the image data.
Docs.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp pixmap into a UIKit image.
Docs.returns: Returns if the copy was successful, otherwise .

MemberSignature.Value: public static UIKit.UIImage ToUIImage (this SkiaSharp.SKBitmap skiaBitmap, nfloat scale, UIKit.UIImageOrientation orientation);
.method public static hidebysig class UIKit.UIImage ToUIImage(class SkiaSharp.SKBitmap skiaBitmap, valuetype System.nfloat scale, valuetype UIKit.UIImageOrientation orientation) cil managed

Docs.param: The scale factor for the image. A factor of 1.0 is the original size of the image.
The rotation that is to be applied to the image.
Docs.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp bitmap into a UIKit image.
Docs.returns: Returns a copy of the bitmap data as a UIKit image.
